snippet: For years, politicians in the Sunshine State have struggled over whether they want to let glitzy Las-Vegas style casinos sprout beside Florida's sugar-white beaches....

headline.main: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'
headline.print_headline: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'

lead_paragraph: For years, politicians in the Sunshine State have struggled over whether they want to let glitzy Las-Vegas style casinos sprout beside Florida's sugar-white beaches.
